title: Remove `log` renamings of `tracing` crate

labels.name: E-easy
labels.description: Call for participation: Experience needed to fix: Easy / not much (good first issue)

labels.name: C-cleanup
labels.description: Category: PRs that clean code up or issues documenting cleanup.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
In https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/74726 I made a dependency import hack to reduce the diff size. We should replace all of these imports with `tracing = "0.1"` and then adjust the crate source by replacing all uses of `log` imports with `tracing` import.

Ideally only a few of these are done at a time to keep conflicts at a minimum and get such PRs merged fast.

Note: do not start working on this until #74726 is merged.


* [ ] [librustc_ast](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/src/librustc_ast/Cargo.toml#L11)
* [x] [librustc_ast_lowering](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/src/librustc_ast_lowering/Cargo.toml#L11)
* [x] [librustc_ast_passes](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/src/librustc_ast_passes/Cargo.toml#L10)
* [x] [librustc_ast_pretty](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/src/librustc_ast_pretty/Cargo.toml#L10)
* [ ] [librustc_builtin_macros](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/src/librustc_builtin_macros/Cargo.toml#L11)
